Name: Snipiyo / スナイピヨ
About the game: Control the chicks and aim for the goal. When you shoot the gun, the sniper's chick bounces off. Think carefully about the direction of the gun and trigger it. Let's aim firmly so that the bullet hits well if the enemy appears. Feature: - Hard stages - Revive again and again
